explains: adj. （地面，地形）高低不平的，崎岖的；（男人的外貌）粗犷而英俊的；强健而坚毅的；（机器或其他制造品）坚固耐用的；艰难的，严峻的
wordGroup: rugged terrain 不平地形，崎岖地带
rugged individualism 顽强的个人主义

sentences.en: We left the rough track and bumped our way over a rugged mountainous terrain.
sentences.cn: 我们驶离坎坷的小道，又颠簸过了崎岖多岩的山地。

sentences.en: The enemy would always have the advantage of familiarity with the rugged terrain.
sentences.cn: 敌人会一直在对崎岖地形的熟悉上占有优势。

sentences.en: Planes parachuted food, clothing, blankets, medicine, and water into the rugged mountainous border region.
sentences.cn: 飞机把食物、衣服、毯子、药和水空投到崎岖的边界山区。
